Uses of Class
io.github.pr0methean.betterrandom.prng.adapter.BaseSplittableRandomAdapter

  • Packages that use BaseSplittableRandomAdapter 
    Package Description
    io.github.pr0methean.betterrandom.prng.adapter
    Implementations of Random backed by instances of SplittableRandom.

    • Uses of BaseSplittableRandomAdapter in io.github.pr0methean.betterrandom.prng.adapter

      Subclasses of BaseSplittableRandomAdapter in io.github.pr0methean.betterrandom.prng.adapter 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  DirectSplittableRandomAdapter
      Abstract subclass of BaseSplittableRandomAdapter where DirectSplittableRandomAdapter.setSeed(long) and BaseRandom.setSeed(byte[]) replace the SplittableRandom that's used in the context in which they are called.
      class  ReseedingSplittableRandomAdapter
      Like SplittableRandomAdapter, but uses a RandomSeederThread to replace each thread's SplittableRandom with a reseeded one as frequently as possible, but not more frequently than it is being used.
      class  SingleThreadSplittableRandomAdapter
      Simple, non-thread-safe implementation of BaseRandom that wraps a SplittableRandom.
      class  SplittableRandomAdapter
      Thread-safe PRNG that wraps a ThreadLocal<SplittableRandom>.
